series_title: Application for Certification: Certified and Continuing
series_description: This series documents certifications held by mineral miners. This series may include, but is not limited to: lists and certification documentation
This series documents the application for certification of skills required for mineral mining when all requirements have not been met. This series may include but is not limited to: applications.
This series documents bond forfeitures resulting from an failure to comply with reclamation laws. This series may but is not limited to: permits.

This series documents the receipt and investigation of mineral mining and reclamation complaints. This series may include, is not limited to: complaints, final investigation report, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 1 Year after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents investigations of fatalities at mineral mines. This series may include, but is not limited to: initial and final investigation reports.
This series documents supporting information used by inspectors to conduct the initial fatality investigation. This may include, but is not limited to: inspector notes.
retention_statement: 1 Year after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents violations that have been found during inspections and the subsequent actions taken. This series may include, but is not limited to:reports and correspondence.
retention_statement: 1 Year after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: documents daily activities of field staff such as site visits. This series may include, but is not limited to: journals.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of calendar year

series_title: Investigations and Inquiries: Mining Activities Without a Permit or License
series_description: This series documents investigations of mining activities when an entity does not have a license or permit. This series may include, but is not limited to: photographs, investigation and excavation activity charts.
This series documents the history of closed mines. This series may include, but is not limited to: final inspection reports and completion maps.
This series documents permits that have been approved but pending as mining activity has not occurred. This series may include, but is not limited to: permits, applications, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the issuance of mining permits and licenses. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, permits, and licenses.
retention_statement: 1 Year after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use
